Name: Crafting Materials
Description: There is a chance to obtain it during Monster Hunts, and it can be used to create Battle Imagines. It is a Raw Material.
Description$english: There is a chance to obtain it during Monster Hunts, and it can be used to create Battle Imagines. It is a Raw Material.
Description2$english: Goblin Mane, can be processed to greatly expand its uses.
